table.title: Information
table.searchTemplate: | inputlookup SPServer | search Name="$Server$" | lookup SPHostInfo host as Name OUTPUTNEW OSVersion,SharedToolsVersion | rex field=OSVersion "^(?<OSBaseVersion>\d+\.\d+)" | lookup OSVersion OSBaseVersion OUTPUTNEW OSVersionName | table Name,OSVersion,OSVersionName,SharedToolsVersion | rename OSVersion as "OS Build", SharedToolsVersion as "Installed Tools", OSVersionName as "OS Version" | transpose

table.title: Services
table.searchTemplate: eventtype=mssharepoint-inventory Type="ServiceInstance" Server="$Server$" | stats latest(Status) as SPStatus by Name,Service,Server | where SPStatus!="Disabled" | rex field=Service "Name=(?<SPService>.*)" | eval SPService=if(isnull(SPService),Service,SPService) | join type=outer Server,SPService [search eventtype=mssharepoint-service host="$Server$" | stats latest(Status) as Status by Name,host | rename host as Server,Name as SPService,Status as WinStatus] | where isnotnull(WinStatus) | append [search eventtype=mssharepoint-service host="$Server$" | stats latest(Status) as WinStatus by host,Name | lookup CriticalServices Name OUTPUT Required | where Required=="True" | table Name,host,WinStatus | rename host as Server ] | table Name,WinStatus

table.title: Drives
table.searchTemplate: eventtype=perfmon-index host="$Server$" object="LogicalDisk" (counter="% Free Space" OR counter="Disk Transfers/sec") instance!="_Total" | eval Value=round(Value,2) | chart latest(Value) as Value by instance,counter

table.title: Performance (Last 15 minutes)
table.searchTemplate: eventtype=perfmon-index host="$Server$" ((object="Memory" counter="% Committed Bytes In Use") OR (object="Processor" counter="% Processor Time" instance="_Total") OR (object="Network Interface" instance!="isatap.*" counter="Bytes Total/sec")) | eval Value=round(Value,2) | eval counter=if(object=="Network Interface","Net("+instance+")",counter) | stats sparkline(avg(Value)) as History,max(Value) as Peak by counter | eval Peak=if(match(counter,"^Net\("),tostring(Peak) + " bytes/sec",tostring(Peak)+"%")

table.title: Application Pools
table.searchTemplate: eventtype=perfmon-index host="$Server$" object=APP_POOL_WAS counter="Current Application Pool State" | stats latest(Value) as State by instance | eval State=case(State==3,"Started",State==5,"Stopped",isnotnull(State),"Unknown") | rename instance as "Application Pool"
